channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump vows to 'tell it like it is' in his joint address to Congress
item.description: President Trump pledged Monday to lay it all out for the American people when he delivers his joint address to Congress on Tuesday.

item.title: Melania Trump to speak for the first time on Capitol Hill in roundtable focused on punishing revenge porn
item.description: First lady Melania Trump will speak on Capitol Hill Monday for the first time since returning to the White House, participating in a roundtable with l...

item.title: In Oscars Speech, Kieran Culkin Confirms The Real Reward In Life Is Building A Family
item.description: Despite our increasingly anti-child culture, getting hitched and having kids is one of the most fulfilling things someone can do.

item.title: Education Department employees offered $25,000 buyout
item.description: The Department of Education is looking to downsize by offering employees a $25,000 buyout.

item.title: Joann Fabric Is Almost Dead, But Sewing Is Forever
item.description: The sewing community has not stopped sewing, but many stopped going to Joann.

item.title: Crypto stocks rise after Trump names currencies in strategic reserve
item.description: Crypto stocks spiked Monday after President Trump named the cryptocurrencies to be held in a U.S. strategic reserve.

item.title: The Loathsome Tate Brothers
item.description: There’s nothing truly masculine about these brutes, who oppose everything that makes for responsible manhood.

item.title: House Democrats invite ousted federal workers to Trump's speech to Congress

item.title: Driving a Stake Through Stakeholder Capitalism
item.description: A review of Andy Puzder’s new book, A Tyranny for the Good of Its Victims .

item.title: Trump’s Worthy Effort to Rein In ‘Independent’ Agencies
item.description: The Trump administration is making a bold and principled attempt to restore these wayward bodies to the control of the executive branch.

item.title: Bring Back The Golden Age Of American Cinema With Movies People Actually Watch
item.description: How many of our neighbors can explain what any one of the last 10 'Best Picture' winners are about except for Oppenheimer ?

item.title: Skyrocketing healthcare costs for illegal immigrants sparks border state outcry
item.description: State Senate Bill 1268 would make it state law to require those who are not in the country legally to mark it down on hospital forms.

item.title: Predicting the Next Pope Isn’t What Matters the Most
item.description: Pope Francis teaches us about hope and mercy from a Roman hospital bed.

item.title: Hinge Point
item.description: Notes on America, Ukraine, and the world.

item.title: Indictment Of Pennsylvania Dems Shows Exactly How Mail Ballot Fraud Happens
item.description: Three Pennsylvania Democrats tried to 'steal the 2021' general election for the Mayor of Millbourne after they gamed the online voter portal.
